content.rendered:
Directed by Prajesh Sen

Written by Prajesh Sen

Cast Jayasurya (RJ Shankar). Manju Warrier (Dr. Reshmi Padath). Shivada Nair (Meryl). Madhavan (Major (voice)). Johny Antony (R.K.V. Moorthy). Sudheer Karamana (Dr. Shenoy). G. Suresh Kumar (Dr. Venugopal). Devi Ajith (Dr. Shiny). Sohan Seenulal (RJ Jomon). Gauthami Nair (RJ Pauly). Midhun Venugopal (RJ Koshy). Ankit Harikrishnan (RJ Arun). Sethu Parvathy (RJ Chitra). Surya Mohan (Moorthy’s Wife). Archit Abhilash (Appu). Ardra Abhilash (Sara). Margaret (Shika). Krishnan Nair (Dr. Krishnan). Shiju S. Basheer (Guitarist). Shaji Kailas (Self). Shyamaprasad (Self)

Language Malayalam

Producers Vijayakumar Palakunnu .B. Rakesh .Ann Sariga

Production Universal Cinema
